name: PRESIDENT-MD
description: This Whatsapp md bot built in NodeJs to make experience better

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put HEROKU APP NAME same as above.

ANTI_BAD_WORD.description: Put words here. If you want it enabled in your bot otherwise leave it blank

LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot send Level up message in chat.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot to read all messages.

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without
and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

SESSION_ID.description: Please put your SESSION_ID here, if you don't have, Visit https://replit.com/@DarkYasiyaofc/FORZEN-MD-V1

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Please put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

MONGODB_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required),change for better experience

THEME.description: Put the theme name you want to use. Avilable themes are PRESIDENT-MD (DON'T CHANGE THIS)

WORKTYPE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is
then only bot number can use it. If it is

heroku.description: Weather it is on heroku or not
